Question: Unable to Login
Answer: First, click "Make Payment" under Online Payments for Homeowners, then click "Forgot Your Password/Username" next to the login button. For your security, an email will be sent to you within 10 minutes with directions for the reset.\n\nPlease check your inbox and junk folder. Did that work?

Question: Confirm a Payment
Answer:
For your security and confidentiality, I am unable to provide your payment activity through chat. Please try to:

1.  Check your email (both the inbox and junk folder) for a payment confirmation.
2.  Log into your account to review your payment history.

If you have not received a confirmation email after 15 minutes or you want to confirm a one-time guest payment, please contact our Service Line at 888-705-0600 M-F 8am-8pm ET (5am-5pm PT) to speak with an agent
to verify if the payment was processed.

Did this resolve your issue?

Question: Unable to find Association Name in Payment
Answer: First, try entering a partial name of the HOA, then clicking Find. For example, for "Apple Association", first type "Apple", then click Find. Refer to your billing correspondence or Management Company if you do not know your HOA name. \n\nDid that work?

Question: Fees
Answer:
Only eCheck and credit/debit payments are available through this site. If you pay with an eCheck, there is no fee. If you pay with a card, there is a $14.95 technology fee per transaction.

Additional fees may be applied by your credit/debit card issuer or management company.

Did this resolve your issue?
